RegularBanditDailySpawnData.Name: Mountain Invaders
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.SpawnMessage: Groups of Mountain Bandits have sacked an entire village, and united under their newly found wealth!
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.DeathMessage: The Mountain Invaders have been brought to justice at [deathPlace]!

RegularBanditDailySpawnData.Name: Expeditioners
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.SpawnMessage: Constant war has resulted in more and more people turning to banditry in the forests, and the chiefs have gathered the new recruits into a giant expedition!
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.DeathMessage: The Forest Expeditioners have been brought to justice [deathPlace]!

RegularBanditDailySpawnData.Name: United Deserters
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.SpawnMessage: Groups of Deserters from all factions have united under fear of persecution, sharing their wealth and forming a formidable threat at [spawnPlace]!
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.DeathMessage: The United Deserters and their dishonourable ways have been brought to swift justice at [deathPlace]!

RegularBanditDailySpawnData.Name: Mad Uprising
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.SpawnMessage: [spawnPlace] has been overtaken by madness after being worn down by rapine and loot!
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.DeathMessage: The mad have been put down at [deathPlace]!

RegularBanditDailySpawnData.Name: Host of Doom
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.SpawnMessage: A large host of murderous cultists of the Harbingers of Wrath amassed an army at [spawnPlace], killing everyone in their path!
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.DeathMessage: The Harbingers of Wrath won't endanger the people of Calradia for the moment. Their forces have been crushed at [deathPlace]!

RegularBanditDailySpawnData.Name: Peasant Revolt
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.SpawnMessage: Injustice, rapine, and high taxes have lead to a massive peasant revolt at [spawnPlace]!
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.DeathMessage: The ludicrous possiblity of filthy peasants being equal to the nobles is no more. The revolutionaries have been crushed at [deathPlace]!

RegularBanditDailySpawnData.Name: Free Folk Uprising
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.SpawnMessage: Famine, unrest, and suppression have lead to a massive uprising of tribal outcasts at [spawnPlace]!
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.DeathMessage: The outcast tribespeople and their dreams of a free Calradia have been crushed at [deathPlace]! The lords and their divine rights shall stay protected.

RegularBanditDailySpawnData.Name: Ravenous Roaming Horde
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.SpawnMessage: Greed, terror, and instability have lead to a massive gathering of rogues at [spawnPlace]!
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.DeathMessage: The roaming horde has been squashed at [deathPlace] and the survivors have returned to their docile servitude.

RegularBanditDailySpawnData.Name: Cult Group
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.SpawnMessage: The desert cult has gathered its forces, terrorizing the people of [spawnPlace]!
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.DeathMessage: The Desert heathens have been stopped at [deathPlace]!

RegularBanditDailySpawnData.Name: Barbarian Exodus
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.SpawnMessage: The barbarians have once again been evicted from their homes, this time fighting for their lives near [spawnPlace]!
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.DeathMessage: The Barbarians shall no longer threaten the prosperity of Calradia. A mass of their heathen race have been cleansed at [deathPlace]!

RegularBanditDailySpawnData.Name: Cleansing Group
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.SpawnMessage: The manhunters have made a large investment given the current chaos of Calradia, buying equipment and supplies for a giant cleansing party starting its journey at [spawnPlace]!
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.DeathMessage: The Manhunters' Cleansing Group has been defeated at [deathPlace]!

RegularBanditDailySpawnData.Name: Makkonian Invasion
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.SpawnMessage: The hordes of Makko have landed at [spawnPlace]. They're eager to raid and conquer!
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.DeathMessage: The grand makkonian invasion have been defeated at [deathPlace]! The scourges of Calradia are no more.

RegularBanditDailySpawnData.Name: Humar Invasion
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.SpawnMessage: A huge united force of clans from Humar invades Calradia! Their army has been spotted at [spawnPlace]. They have no mercy for the people of Calradia, as they seek glory and wealth in battle!
RegularBanditDailySpawnData.DeathMessage: The Humar invasion force received a crushing defeat their end at [deathPlace].
